post:
<center>Independence Day For our US brethren is around the corner.
To celebrate, we have some great offers available in all shapes and sizes only available in the USA and all in dollars :wink:

<b><u><font size="6">Hybrid Dual Storage</font></u></b>

1 Dedicated Thread @ 2.8GHz
3GB Dedicated RAM
30GB SSD
60GB HDD
1 IPv4
1TB Bandwidth @ 1gbps
$6.35/m
[Order Here](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=853)
Phoenix, Arizona

With our Hybrid range, your thread as well as RAM is 100% dedicated to your usage and yours alone. 

<b><u><font size="6">Resource Pool</font></u></b>

2 vCores @ 3.2Ghz
1GB RAM
5TB Bandwidth @ 1gbps
1TB HDD
2 private IPs  + 2 IPv4s
2 VM Max
$7/m
[Order Here](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=878)
Dallas, Texas

This mini promo pool allows you to create and destroy your instances on demand with resources available in your pool to allocate to a maximum of 2 VPS or to a single instance. 100% whitelabelled with WHMCS module available. Plans are stackable
Private IPs are also available.

<b><u><font size="7">H</font><font size ="4">U</font><font size="7">G</font><font size="6">E</font><font size="6"> Storage</font></u></b>

1 vCore @ 3.2Ghz
1GB RAM
3TB Bandwidth @ 1gbps
1TB HDD
1 private IP  + 1 IPv4
$5/m
[Order Here](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=879)
Dallas, Texas

1TB HDD storage plans. These can also be stacked or even stacked on top of the mini pool.
Private IP included. Part of our regular plans on our site with more than 50% off

<b><u><font size="6">Dual Storage</font></u></b>
<b><u>DSX101 Discounted</u></b>

1vCore @ 3.4Ghz
1GB RAM
20GB NVMe SSD Storage
50GB HDD Storage
1TB Bandwidth @ 10gbps
$5/m
[Order Here](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=880)
Dallas, Texas

One of our regular dual storage plans available on our site discounted.
Private IPs optional </center>
